title: bhakta shikhAmaNi
sahitya:
bhakta shikhAmaNI avanE indap-pArellAm paramanaip-pArppavanE


anupallavi

  uttama shIlan sattiya sandan UrukkudaviDum pEranukUlanAm


caraNam    mAdarait-tAyena madittiDum tUyan mAsilA nallurai pEshiDum vAyan
jAti matam kaDanda sattiya vIran sarvAtma sEvai shei samayOga dhIran
